thread.title: Turning Off Your Dreams Is a Bad Idea
thread.title_full: Turning Off Your Dreams Is a Bad Idea

title: Turning Off Your Dreams Is a Bad Idea
text:
Published By: The Daily Beast - Yesterday 
Researchers have discovered a neural switch that can turn dreaming on and off. But losing the ability to dream could be dangerous....
